Dark Glass UI is a smooth ui texture pack. It features a transparent background in inventories and the pause screen, a cool background, an upgraded font, and of course a clean, smooth user interface.
This pack includes around 700 manually edited textures and took around a week of work to create
enjoy the pack and feel free to leave suggestions in the comments

clean aesthetic

pause

title: Kelly?s Minecraft Vanilla RTX Conversion Pack (Better Water!)
briefDescription: This is a simple vanilla texture pack/conversion for RTX on Minecraft Windows 10 Edition! It's for the most part an exact conversion, and all non-moving ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a simple vanilla texture pack/conversion for RTX on Minecraft Windows 10 Edition! It?s for the most part an exact conversion, and all non-moving things have been converted. Everything has had special care, and tweaking put into it! ?
EVERYTHING THAT DOES NOT MOVE, has been converted from a simple vanilla to a very fancy, and flashy texture pack. Every block that should glow, glows. Everything that should be smooth and slippery, is smooth and slippery. This may seem like just an ordinary vanilla-to-RTX conversion, but this one has a twist! This pack has a few special, and fun glowing blocks! They can be used for testing, or they can be used for fun scenes. It?s up to you really. And to access those blocks, when creating a world you wanna activate the Education Edition setting. Those are what supply you with the Elemental blocks, which are transformed into the fun blocks with their own properties. So yes! This does mean that you no longer have to sacrifice concrete, terracotta, or clay in order to have the shiinyy liiights!! Therefore this pack is excellent for worlds that were normally vanilla, that you wanna add a very nice touch too! The extra blocks include may colors of lights, a warm and cold version of a white light, an EXTREMELY bright spot light block, a few disco and colorful tiles, along with a few fun materials like brushed Aluminum, and Copper! (By the way, for the blocks to work properly, make sure the texture pack is activated on that world, and not just as a global resource)
My Discord username is[ Kelly The Dragon!#9999 ]. If you have any questions/Suggestions, just friend me on there, and I?ll be more than happy to answer! (Or if you just want someone to hang out with, lol)

title: Minecraft RTX ? NVIDIA PBR Texture Pack (Example) V0.9
briefDescription: Here's the most recent PBR resource pack from NVIDIA and Blockworks. The texture pack is a work in progress and covers about 95% of textures. You ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Here?s the most recent PBR resource pack from NVIDIA and Blockworks. The texture pack is a work in progress and covers about 95% of textures. You can use this resource pack to enable ray tracing on your worlds.
This is an example resource pack which was created by NVIDIA and Blockworks. It introduces players to ray tracing and gives you a complete new experience of Minecraft with RTX!
For more information on Minecraft with RTX.
Microsoft Minecraft with RTX FAQ
Minecraft with RTX PBR texture guide
Minecraft World Conversion guide (Java to Bedrock)

title: Java 1.7 Animations
briefDescription: Do you hate the vanilla bedrock player animations and general feel of the new bedrock? Or maybe you want yet another way to make bedrock ...
Description: My contacts: discord: ambient#2309 Youtube channel (subscribe if you want to see more packs!)

crawledImageUrls.text: Do you hate the vanilla bedrock player animations and general feel of the new bedrock? Or maybe you want yet another way to make bedrock closer to java PVP. Look no further, because this pack makes many improvements and tweaks to player animations to more closely resemble Java edition 1.7 (and even bedrock 1.12!).
One of the most notable changes is the tweaking of right hand position and rotation, both in 1st and 3rd person. Body rotation has also been tweaked to more closely resemble java edition.
The armor now will turn red when players take damage. You can also change the tint to match bedrock edition 1.12 in the subpacks section. Damage particles are included.
The player now has the 1.7 ?punch-eating? animation when eating food or drinking a potion, just look down at the floor to activate.
The fire model now extends throughout the entire player?s body, like in java edition. The orange fire overlay has also been disabled.
Inventory shift-clicking animations, slot border, and hotbar popping animations have been disabled, as they appear in Java edition. Thanks for the help LukasPAH!
The player model now renders 2D in the start and pause menu, like bedrock edition 1.12.
A visual sword blocking animation has been added when you crouch to sneak, and can be disabled with subpacks to fit your preference.
Fishing rods now have critical hit particles and the bobber is 2D. All other projectiles are now scaled according to their distance from the camera, like in Java edition.

title: Winter Forests Resource Pack
briefDescription: Winter has descended on Minecraft! The leaves have fallen, and the bitter cold has taken hold. Foliage and grass suffers in the cold temperatures, and ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Winter has descended on Minecraft! The leaves have fallen, and the bitter cold has taken hold. Foliage and grass suffers in the cold temperatures, and where once there was rain there is now snow (now accompanied by a subtle icy sound), although it still may not stick around at all elevations. Winter Forests is winter resource pack that doesn?t merely turn everything white!
This resource pack makes the following changes:
